summary: Successfully completed comprehensive vendor management system backend testing with 100% success rate (36/36 tests passed). Fixed critical invite_member function bug that was preventing organization membership creation. All vendor flow requirements fully validated including RBAC, tenancy isolation, CSV validation, refresh heuristics, opportunity lifecycle, alerts, and performance targets.
passed_tests: RBAC: Anonymous/VIEWER correctly denied access to /api/ingest/spend/* endpoints
RBAC: ANALYST+ correctly allowed access to spend ingest and refresh endpoints
RBAC: ADMIN+ correctly allowed access to alerts and opportunity status changes
Tenancy isolation: Org1 and Org2 data completely isolated, no cross-org data leakage
CSV validation: Date/amount validation working, gl_code warnings generated, case-insensitive headers supported
Refresh pipeline: Vendor canonicalization, vendor_master building, and savings opportunities generation working
Heuristics: VolumeDiscount, Consolidation, and TailCleanup opportunity types all generated correctly
Opportunity lifecycle: List, assign (ANALYST+), status transitions (ADMIN+), audit logging, and idempotency all working
Alerts system: /api/alerts/test delivery and audit recording working correctly
Performance: 10k spend lines ingest+refresh completed in 0.26s (well under 2s target)
